data.text: I booked the igloo it was more like a recliner chair.  Not so comfortable.  As I was laying and tried to come out I fell on the floor! The last part  where the legs are folded down as soon as I sat on it and I fell! FYI, worst part is there is no bathroom, no shower. Zero! You have to go out and find toilet or a shower place.  Very inconvenient!  Not coming back.
data.title: Waste of money

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Nyd2024,

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We sincerely apologize for the discomfort and inconvenience you experienced during your stay in our Igloo Pod. We strive to provide our guests with a comfortable and enjoyable experience, and it is clear that we fell short in this instance.

We appreciate your feedback and will consider your comments as we work to improve our accommodations. If there is anything else we can do to make this right, please do not hesitate to let us know.

Again, thank you for sharing your experience with us. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and provide you with a more positive stay.

Best regards,

The Lounge Team
owner_response.author: Rebecca S

data.text: I traveled with my daughter and experienced a long layover at Dubai Terminal. Upon arrival at Sleep 'n Fly, we received a warm welcome. Since my daughter wasn't feeling well, they kindly allowed us to check in early. We were able to get the much-needed rest in a comfortable sleep pod. The place was quiet, and we were able to rest peacefully. Additionally, the pod's convenient location within the airport made it easy for us to reach our check-in gate. I'll definitely be booking a pod again the next time I have a long layover while traveling.
data.title: Dubai Sleep n fly Terminal 3

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear A7149YIkatem,

Thank you for sharing your positive experience at sleep 'n fly during your recent layover at DXB Airport. We are delighted to hear that you and your daughter received a warm welcome and were able to check in early to rest. It is wonderful to know that you found the place quiet and peaceful, allowing you to get the much-needed rest before continuing your journey.

We appreciate your kind words about the convenient location of the sleep pod within the airport, making it easy for you to reach your check-in gate. We are glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay and that you are considering booking us again for your future layovers.

Thank you for choosing sleep 'n fly and for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Best regards,

The Lounge Team
owner_response.author: Rebecca S

data.text: Very helpful person at the reception who cooperated well and provided hotel booking on time. Pleasant stay and would love to visit again. Very clean and well managed. Thank you. I arrived at the airport in the midnight and was able to get a sleeping pod.
data.title: Helpful staff and professional service

owner_response.title: Owner response

We are very happy to know that you loved your stay and enjoyed the warm hospitality provided by our team.

We look forward to welcoming you again soon and sharing a better experience.

Best regards,

The Lounge Team

data.text:
Reservation was easy. Two representatives at this place were awesome. Kim is the best. She helped me made feel like home. She went out of her way to take me to the restroom. I strongly recommend this place to all to rest especially senior citizens.
